TrainerBio: Nivarti  is an Enterprise Agile Coach with over 15 years of experience guiding Fortune 500 companies through large-scale transformations. He specializes in leadership development, organizational design, and scaling agile frameworks. Ashish is a sought-after speaker and has trained over 5,000 executives globally.

Mansoor is a seasoned Lean-Agile trainer and consultant focused on product management and business agility. With a background in software engineering and product leadership, he helps organizations build high-performing teams and deliver products that customers love.

Ilija is an ICAgile authorized instructor with a deep passion for coaching and facilitation. He combines expertise in psychology and team dynamics to create immersive learning experiences that empower individuals to unlock their full potential.

Ashish  is an Enterprise Agile Coach with over 18 years of experience guiding Fortune 500 companies through large-scale transformations. He specializes in leadership development, organizational design, and scaling agile frameworks. Ashish is a sought-after speaker and has trained over 5,000 executives globally.

Prashant is a seasoned Lean-Agile trainer and consultant focused on product management and business agility. With a background in software engineering and product leadership, he helps organizations build high-performing teams and deliver products that customers love.
